channel.description: Recent content in api on Cdani's Blog

item.title: Langchain pt. 3 - Integration of APIs into an AI-powered application
item.description: Intro Last year, Gartner put Generative AI at the peak of inflated expectations in its AI Hype Cycle. Recently, big tech leaders compared the hype around GenAI to the dotcom bubble. Furthermore, according to some rumors, the main Cloud Providers are even giving instructions to their Sales Teams to slow down the enthusiasm towards customers regarding GenAI initiatives and promoting cost-vs-benefits awareness. Has the drop into the trough of disillusionment already begun?
